EmailTemplate.name: LLC Dissolution - DO NOT USE
EmailTemplate.subject: AZ Corp Fax Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your Dissolution order. Attached, please find your customized Dissolution documents. In order to ensure your order is processed as quickly as possible, please follow the steps listed below.
• Please ensure that your company is in good standing with all applicable governmental agencies (Secretary of State, Tax Board, etc).
• Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink only.
• Sign your name in black ink on all copies as indicated.
• Do not make any changes to the attached document(s) as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support.
• All members must sign the attached Action by Unanimous Written Consent. Once signed, this document is the members’ written approval of the dissolution of the LLC. If your LLC was not formed through LegalZoom, please check your operating agreement to ensure that the members may act by written consent. You don't have to mail this form back to LegalZoom, but keep it for your records.
• Mail the documents (except for the Action by Unanimous Written Consent) to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office will only accept original signed documents.
Courier Deliveries and USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 9900 Spectrum Drive Austin, TX 78717
• Alternatively, you can fax the signed documents to (323) 962-4521. Please include your name and order number on the fax coversheet to ensure proper routing of your document to our processing team.
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
